author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Migrate DD4hep plugins to an agreed location under **dd4hep** directory
* Fix them so that would run. This can be tested with a newly defined 2021 geometry scenario which is defined in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27646
* Merge declaration and definition for plugins
* Avoid string copies
* The rest is kept unchanged

Note: When https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27637 is merged the GeantUnits should be replaced with CMSUnits

#### PR validation:

Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:
- verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch
- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html)
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
title: DD4hep: HCal Algorithms Moved to Geometry/HcalAlgo Package
